actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to permit States under Federal-State agreements, to provide for coverage for hospital insurance benefits for the aged for certain State and local employees whose services are not otherwise covered by the insurance system established by such title.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance
subjects_top_term: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Permits under title II (Old Age, Survivors, and Disability Insurance) of the Social Security Act, States under Federal-State agreements and subject to State contributions, to provide for coverage for hospital insurance benefits for the aged for qualified State and local employees whose services are not otherwise covered by the insurance system established by such title.

titles.title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to permit States under Federal-State agreements, to provide for coverage for hospital insurance benefits for the aged for certain State and local employees whose services are not otherwise covered by the insurance system established by such title.
